posts.content: Can Damage reduction be picked more than 10 times?

posts.author: Merc
posts.content: Oh no I just read it can only be take 3 times doh

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Perfectly true, Merc, you can only take the Epic Damage Reduction feat 3 times. However, if you go for a full 30 levels of Dwarven Defender you will automatically receive a further 7 Damage Reductions (1 each at levels 6, 10, 14, 18, 22, 26 and 30). So, technically, you can have 10 ranks of Damage Reduction, totalling DR of 30/-

Oh, and welcome to the Guild!

Cheers
